snippet: For a Yankees team likely to play into October, Rafael Soriano has proved more than able to fill the closer’s role that opened up when Mariano Rivera injured his knee.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that New York Yankees pitcher Rafael Soriano has 40 saves since replacing injured closer Mariano Rivera in May 2012.
lead_paragraph: For a Yankees team likely to play into October, Rafael Soriano has proved more than able to fill the closer’s role that opened up when Mariano Rivera injured his knee.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Rafael Soriano a Successful Fill-In for Mariano Rivera
headline.main: A Big Void, and Closing It Well
headline.print_headline: A Big Void, and Closing It Well
